name: Vita: Rift of a Nation
description:
Return to Atria: Where Freedom Sparks Revolution in Vita: Rift of a Nation

The shackles of servitude have been shattered, freedom tasted, but for Naysa-Dae, an Earth Vita, the fight is far from over. In Vita: Rift of a Nation, the second part in the Vita series, you'll dive headfirst into the vibrant world of Atria. Feel the tremors of rebellion shake the very foundations of Opolo.

Reclaim Your Power, Earth Vita:

- Naysa-Dae's journey evolves from personal liberation to a fight for the soul of Opolo. Witness the transformation of a slave woman into a fierce leader, wielding the power of the Earth Vitas in this fast paced, story rich classic RPG.

- Unlock your powers as an Earth Vita to free Opolo. This ancient American inspired land mixed with other worldly fantasy.

- Master the dynamic Dule Resource Turn-Based Battle System (DRTBS). Strategize every move, harnessing the ebb and flow of battles. Manage turn order and resources as you fight for your freedom with devastating attacks in an ever changing battle field.

- Immerse in custom, hand craft maps, battle fields and art.

- Enjoy somber world music and heart pounding battle themes

- Team up with a battle-hardened veteran, an outlander, and a fellow slave with their own backstories, hopes, and dreams for the nation of Opolo.

- Learn why slavery took over the land, and who's truly behind it.

Be the rift that Atria will never forget.
